Pre-Game Insights: India has already clinched a spot in the next round thanks to its undefeated record so far in the tournament.
Canada is competing in its first ICC T20 World Cup.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The ICC T20 World Cup is co-hosted by the United States and the West Indies.
This is the ninth time this event has been staged.
Others: The match takes place on Saturday, June 15, 2024 at 10:30 a.m. ET.
The cricket contest between India and Canada can be watched by Fubo subscribers on Willow TV.
